/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of green to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, making the buildings appear taller and the sky seem vast. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting against the gray and white of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the hustle and bustle of city life.
